name: Elves Castle and Secrets
description:
Elves Castle and Secrets is a 3D game in which you, being an ordinary citizen, decide to explore your small town and find something interesting in it. Explore all the beauties of the city, find interesting things for yourself. In this game, you can relax after a hard day's work in search of items with good music. You will be able to freely move around the map in search of any items that may seem strange to you, this is an umbrella, a camera, and you can find everything else by playing in the game
In the game you will find very beautiful graphics, relaxing music.

GameFuture:
- Beautiful world
- Calming music
- Free movement around the world
- Both adults and children can play
